general.ABOUT_STATISTICS_STRING:
{users} total users 
{guilds} total guilds 
{commands} total commands 
Bot up for {uptime}
general.BANNER_ERROR: This server doesn't have a banner.
general.CHANGELOG_DESCRIPTION: The latest changelog can be viewed [here](https://github.com/smolespi/Hibiki/releases/latest).
general.CONFIG_AGREECHANNEL_DESCRIPTION: The channel where new members can run the agree command in.
general.CONFIG_AGREEROLE_DESCRIPTION: The role given to members after running the agree command.
general.CONFIG_ANTIINVITE_DESCRIPTION: Enables or disables the AntiInvite module.
general.CONFIG_ANTISPAM_DESCRIPTION: Enables or disables the AntiSpam module.
general.CONFIG_AUTOROLES_DESCRIPTION: Roles automatically assigned to new members.
general.CONFIG_CHANNELARRAYTOOLONG: The maximum amount of channels is {maximum}.
general.CONFIG_CONTAINSINVITE: Invites aren't allowed in this type of response.
general.CONFIG_DELETE_DESCRIPTION: Deletes and resets the server's config.
general.CONFIG_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you'd like to delete the server's config?
general.CONFIG_DELETED: Deleted and reset the server's config.
general.CONFIG_DESCRIPTION: To get more info about a command, run `{prefix}help`.
general.CONFIG_EASYTRANSLATE_DESCRIPTION: Auto translate messages reacted to with a flag.
general.CONFIG_EVENTLOGGING_DESCRIPTION: The channel that channel, role, and server edits log to.
general.CONFIG_IGNOREDLOGGINGCHANNELS_DESCRIPTIO: Channels to exclude from message logging.
general.CONFIG_INVALIDNUMBERSIZE: The number you provides is invalid.
general.CONFIG_INVITEPUNISHMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Punishments given to a member when they post an invite.
general.CONFIG_JOINMESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: A custom join message sent when a member joins.
general.CONFIG_LEAVEJOIN_DESCRIPTION: The channel member greeting and leave messages post to.
general.CONFIG_LEAVEMESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: A custom leave message sent when a member leaves.
general.CONFIG_MEMBERLOGGING_DESCRIPTION: The channel new member info is logged.
general.CONFIG_MESSAGELOGGING_DESCRIPTION: The channel that message edits and deletions log to.
general.CONFIG_MODLOGGING_DESCRIPTION: The channel that reputation and punishment info logs to.
general.CONFIG_MUTEDROLE_DESCRIPTION: The role to give to muted members.
general.CONFIG_PINAMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: The amount of reactions needed to post to the pinboard.
general.CONFIG_PINCHANNEL_DESCRIPTION: The channel the pinboard will post to.
general.CONFIG_PINEMOJI_DESCRIPTION: The emoji to trigger the pinboard. Defaults to üìå.
general.CONFIG_PINSELFPINNING_DESCRIPTION: Whether members can self pin their own messages.
general.CONFIG_ROLEARRAYTOOLONG: The maximimum amount of roles is {maximum}. Try again with less.
general.CONFIG_SNIPINGIGNORE_DESCRIPTION: Channels to ignore from message sniping.
general.CONFIG_SNIPINGINVITES_DESCRIPTION: Whether messages posted with Discord invites can be sniped.
general.CONFIG_SNIPINGPERMISSION_DESCRIPTION: Whether only staff can snipe messages.
general.CONFIG_SPAMPUNISHMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Punishments given to a member when they spam.
general.CONFIG_SPAMTHRESHOLD_DESCRIPTION: Amount of messages sent in 1s before AntiSpam enables.
general.CONFIG_STAFFROLE_DESCRIPTION: The role that designates whether a member is staff or not.
general.CONFIG_VERIFIEDROLE_DESCRIPTION: The role given to a member when they're verified with the command.
general.HELP_DESCRIPTION: To get more info about a command, run `{prefix}help <command>`.
general.PROFILE_BIO_DESCRIPTION: Sets a short bio to be displayed on your profile.
general.PROFILE_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you'd like to delete your profile data?
general.PROFILE_DELETE_DESCRIPTION: Deletes and resets your profile data.
general.PROFILE_DELETED: Deleted and cleared your profile data.
general.PROFILE_PRONOUNS_DESCRIPTION: Sets the preferred pronouns you go by.
general.PROFILE_TIMEZONE_DESCRIPTION: Sets your timezone to show your current time on your profile.
general.PROFILE_TIMEZONEHIDE_DESCRIPTION: Toggles hiding your current time from your profile.
general.SPLASHBANNER_ERROR: This server doesn't have a splash page banner.

global.AUTOMOD_INVITES: Posting Discord invite links aren't allowed here.
global.ERROR_ALLOWDMS: The **{command}** command can only be ran in a server.
global.ERROR_CLIENTPERMS: I need permission to **{perms}** to run that command.
global.ERROR_DISABLED: The **{command}** command has been disabled in this server.
global.ERROR_DISABLEDCATEGORY: The category the **{command}** command is in has been disabled in this server.
global.ERROR_EMBEDPERMS: I don't have permission to **embed links** in {channel}.
global.ERROR_NSFW: The **{command}** command can only be ran in a NSFW channel.
global.ERROR_OUTPUT:
An error occurred and has been logged. 
 ```js
{error}
```
global.ERROR_REQUIREDPERMS: You need permission to **{perms}** to run that command.
global.ERROR_SENDPERMS: I don't have permission to **send messages** in {channel}.
global.ERROR_STAFFCOMMAND: The **{command}** can only be used by staff members.
global.ERROR_VOICE: You must be in a voice channel or in the same voice channel as me to use the **{command}** command.
global.RESERROR_IMAGE: Failed to send the image. Try again later.
global.TIMEOUT_REACHED: The timeout for input has been reached.

moderation.KICK_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you'd like to kick **{member}**?
moderation.KICK_TOOLOWROLE: My role isn't high enough to kick **{member}**.

music.END_OF_QUEUE: The last song in the queue has ended so playback has stopped.
music.LOADFAILED: Failed to load that item. Try again later, or maybe try a different URL.
music.NO_MATCHES: Nothing was found for your search. Maybe try a YouTube URL?
music.PAUSE_PAUSED: Paused playing **{track}**. To resume, run the command again.
music.PLAY_RESERROR:
An error occurred while trying to play that item.

 ```js
{error}
```
music.PLAYLIST_NOTHING: No valid items were found in the playlist
music.QUEUE_SHUFFLED: Shuffled all songs in the queue.
music.SEARCH_RESULTS:
Type the matching number to start playing it.

music.SONG_REPEAT: **{option}** repeating the current song. To change the option, run the command again.
music.STOPPED_PLAYING: Stopped playing and ended the queue.
music.TOO_LONG: The track you requested to be played is too long. The limit is **{limit} minutes**.

owner.LOGS_COMMAND: **{command} has been ran **{times} in the last 24 hours.
